Game information:  


Mousecraft - this is a classic puzzle game in which you have to spend
a group of mice to the desired slice of cheese. But not so easy, as you
can not directly control your wards, instead you will have to interact
with surrounding objects, such as blocks strongly resemble those of
Tetris that will topple from the ceiling level. In campaign mode you
have to go as much as 50 levels, using ingenuity and finding a variety
of ways through all sorts of obstacles in order to reach his goal,
defeating the various enemies along the way. The game will also present
a list of leaders and full-created levels.


RePack Features:  

MouseCraft
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not cut / recoded
